English: Greater Banat
With German villages and towns in the area now outside German control it would be in everyone's best interest for them to unify with Banat.
Greater Yugoslavia
Yugoslavia is yet to encompass all lands of the southern Slavs, we must seek out and regain these lands for the good of the people.
Persian Border Dispute
The lands of Khuzestan have been dominated by Persia for too long! It is time for us to assert our rights and take back our own!
The Kurdish Diaspora
Our Kurdish brothers are crying out for freedom, we should bring them into our nation and return them to us.
Reclamation of Bulgarian Lands
The Great Powers have denied Bulgaria her destiny, that of ruling all Bulgarian peoples. Let us defy them, and forge the greater Bulgaria we deserve!
Claim Greater Bosnia
The Great Powers have denied Bosnia her destiny, that of ruling all the Bosniak peoples. Let us defy them, and forge a greater Bosnia by removing the Serbs from the premises!
Recliaming Slovene Lands
The Slovene provinces of Trieste and Klagenfurt have been under foreign rulers for too long, let us reclaim our land!
Rebuild the Kingdom of Aragon
The old kingdom of Aragon has to be reconquered for re-incorporation into the state, now we have a chance to reinstate her and return our people to us.
Restoration of the Khmer Empire
The Khmer Empire was once the greatest in Southern Asia, let us reclaim our old lands and forge an empire that will stand against the powers of the West.
Reincorporation of the Armenian Plateau
Armenia has a rightful claim on the lands to the west, we must stake this claim and fight the Turks for it so we can unit with our brothers in Adana.
Claim Greater Tibet
The Tibetan Empire once ruled a vast land that was taken away from us by the barbarians. The Tibetan people still live in these lands and the time has come for us the claim whats historically ours.
Claim Sevastopol
Sevastopol is rightful Pontic clay, we must reclaim it from the scum who overran it centuries ago.
Reclaiming the Afsharid Dynasty Lands
Now that Persia has westernized and become a power in her own right, we can reclaim the lands of our forefathers from the conquerers who have taken them from us.
Staking our Claim on the Duchy of Anjou
Our King has a distant claim on the Duchy of Anjou, and although the time for such royal claims has passed, we still feel that it is a valid enough reason to attempt to reclaim those lands.
Uniting the Basque Peoples
The Basque have remained spread across Northern Spain for centuries, and now that we've gained our independence we should extend our state to all the Basque peoples.
Incorporating the Pashtun
Now that we've extended our realm to the Afsharid Dynasty holdings, we can try to incorporate the Pashtun regions in Afghanistan
Reclaiming Bosnia
Bosnia was once an integral part of the Croatian Kingdom, and even today our ethnic legacy carries on throughout Bosnia, now that we have our sovereignty it is time for us to reclaim the region.
Reclaiming Our Historical Holdings

Since regaining our freedom from the Austrians our people have grown increasingly militaristic and the cries for retaking the provinces we lost to the Treaty of Campo Formio have grown to the point where they can no longer be ignored. It is time to reclaim our prominence in the Mediterranean.
The Kingdom of Leon
For the first time in centuries the Leonese people are free from Castilian rule, what better way to celebrate this than to reclaim our old holdings in Iberia?
Greater Assyria
For the first time in millennia the Assyrian peoples have a nation of their own, let us extend it to all our peoples for the glory of god!
Extending Alaska
The borders of Free Alaska need to be extended, our people freeze and starve in our tiny colony so the only logical choice is to move south.
Irredentismo Italiano

The Italian Irredentist movement strove for the unification of all territories in the immediate vicinity of Italy which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Ticino and Nice, but it also meant territorial ambitions for Dalmatia, Savoy, Corfu, and Malta.
Extending to the Danube

Now that we've regained all our cultural land from the Turks and Austrians we should move to annex the province of Pancevo into our realm, the Romanian minority is eager to join us and the province would extend our natural borders along the Danube.
Extending Our Borders
Numerous groups of our people exist outside the Netherlands currently, it would be in our best interest to attempt to bring them back into the fold.
Greater Lithuania
Now that we've gained our independence it is imperative to push the borders of Lithuania to our ethnic boundaries.
Claim Mayan Lands
Now that Yucatan has joined our union, we should unite all the Mayans under the flag of the Federal Republic.
Reconquer Central America
The First Mexican Empire annexed Central America in 1822. Now that we have been considered a great power, we should expand to the south, like our fathers before us.
Claim Greater Poland
We can't let our brothers in East Prussia and Lithuania to stay under foreign rule!
Refute Manifest Destiny
The American claims to our frontier have proven to be little more than empty air and bluster. Those lands belong to us, and no other.
Triune Kingdom

In the Croatian-Hungarian Settlement, the territory known as Lands of the Crown of Saint Stephen was officially defined as "a state union of the Kingdom of Hungary and the Kingdoms of Dalmatia, Croatia and Slavonia". Since then, the Croats are pushing for uniting the Triune Kingdom under our flag. We should give them what they want - it would definitely help our economy and our dreams of becoming the main naval power of the Adriatic Sea.
Claim Greater Antilles
We must claim the Greater Antilles to unite all the Caribbean islands under our Federation and to ensure our rule in the region by getting the most populous and important islands.
Greater Karelia
We must claim Finnish Karelia and the Kola Peninsula to unite all Karelians under our flag.
Claim East Turkestan
We must free our Uighur brothers from Chinese rule to unite all of the Central Asian Turkic people under our flag!
Claim Greater Siam
We shall reclaim the lands ruled by the early Rattanakosin Kingdom to restore the glory of our nation.
Il Risorgimento

The Italian Resurgence movement strove for the transfer to the Kingdom of Italy of all territories in the immediate vicinity of the Kingdom which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Austrian lands in Italy proper, but it also meant territorial ambitions further into Dalmatia, and Austria.
French: Le mouvement irrédentiste voulait voir transférés à la couronne italienne tous les territoires limitrophes peuplés majoritairement ou en partie d'italiens. Cela concerne non seulement les possessions autrichiennes en Italie, mais aussi des territoires en Dalmatie et en Autriche.
German: Die italienische Irredentistenbewegung strebte danach, alle Gebiete in der unmittelbaren Umgebung des Königreichs Italien, die tatsächlich oder vermeintlich größtenteils von Italienischstämmigen bewohnt wurden, dem Königreich anzugliedern. Dies beinhaltete nicht nur Ansprüche auf österreichische Ländereien in italienischem Besitz, sondern bedeutete auch territoriale Ansprüche weiter nach Dalmatien und Österreich hinein.
Spanish: El movimiento irredentista italiano aspiraba a obtener para Italia todos los territorios vecinos del joven reino que estaban, mayoritaria o parcialmente poblados por personas de etnia italiana. Esto no solo incluía los territorios austriacos en Italia propiamente dicha, sino también regiones diversas en Dalmacia y el interior de Austria.

English: Claim Greater Korea
We must reclaim the lands once owned by the ancient Korean kingdoms of Koguryo and Balhae to unite all Koreans under our flag.
Claim Greater Andinia
§RGain 10 infamy§! The borders of the Jewish State must stretch from coast to coast, all of Patagonia shall be ours!
Claim Greater Israel
§RGain 5 infamy§! Once there was a Jewish community in Dutch Guiana, there shall be a lot more in all of Guiana!
Claim Greater Israel
§RGain 10 infamy§! The Jewish nation can't exists without a sea access, we shall claim the rest of the Rift Valley and Kenya in order to fix this problem.
Claim Greater Israel
§RGain 5 infamy§! We must expand beyond our borders and claim all of Angola under our flag.
Claim Greater Georgia
We shall claim the lands inhabited by our Laz brothers to unite all Georgians under our flag.
Großdeutschland
The German peoples are led by a government willing and able to do something about uniting the Germans living in foreign lands into the state, so let us begin!
Großdeutschland
The German peoples are led by a government willing and able to do something about uniting the Germans living in foreign lands into the state, so let us begin!
Claim Greater Cascadia
It's time to claim Alaska and Yukon to unite all of the Pacific Northwest under our flag.
Claim Greater Rhodesia
We must claim Northern Rhodesia and Nyasaland in order to become the Federation of Rhodesia and Nyasaland.
Our Paraguayan Claims
We have waited long enough, it's time to make our Paraguayan claims an integral part of our nation!
Our Paraguayan Claims
We have waited long enough, it's time to make our Paraguayan claims an integral part of our nation!
Claim Greater Rio Grande
When we declared independence from Mexico we claimed the states of Durango, Chihuahua and New Mexico. Now we are in a position to make these claims a reality.
